mapper.insert: insert into blog(id, title, description, avatar, create_time, update_time, publish_time, author_id, status, content, classify_id, types) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{description}, #{avatar}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{publishTime}, #{authorId}, #{status}, #{content}, #{classifyId}, #{types})
mapper.select: select b.*, author.name as authorName, c.name as classifyName from blog b join user as author on author.id = b.author_id join classify as c on c.id = b.classify_id where b.id = #{id}
